talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Master Warrior Rodrigo$
Hey! {user_nick}!! I know they say the darkest hour is when you are sleepiest, but you just look darker than the darkest hour right now. Are you all right?

$Master Warrior Rodrigo$
I won't spread a word! You can count on me. A great mentor like me is here for you to depend on!
Though I'm not as great as the great Barnac, I've wielded the sword much more than you did.
<html>$The Emerging Cracks $</html>

$Master Warrior Rodrigo$
You keep having ominous dreams these days? Tsk tsk. What are you? A 33 year old girl? A warrior like you is bothered by dreams? That's a disappointment. Oh wait... maybe you have prophetic abilities or something...?

$Master Warrior Rodrigo$
Hey I was just fooling with you. Don't give me such a serious face. Young people should enjoy humour, why are you so dark?
Well... if you're concerned about dreams... Why don't you go and see a Priestess of Darkness? Rosetta has been telling fortunes at a discounted price these days... Oh! I think that was supposed to be a secret. Anyway, she can help.

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
You look so dark. Is there something bothering you?
Well… Master Warrior Rodrigo was worried about you too…

$Velskud$
…Hmph. (Looks like he won't talk to you yet)

$Master Warrior Rodrigo$
Go to Priestess of Darkness Rosetta.
She's a cute girl who's kind enough to laugh at my jokes. I'm sure she'll lighten up your mood!
It sure is a pity that a girl like her has to be a Priestess all her life....(Master Warrior Rodrigo mumbles quietly to himself)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It feels almost real as if it just happened.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
You're having strange dreams? You've had the dream long ago... but you suddenly remembered it?
Hmm, and you were devoured by the darkness....

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
(Priestess of Darkness Rosetta opens her mouth after thinking quietly for a while)
Though the Priestesses of Darkness are closer to the darkness than anyone else, we are merely standing near the boundaries. We've never encountered the darkness itself before.
But you, {user_nick}, you seem to have met it.

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
It's also known as... the Goddess's nightmare.
There's not much information known about the nightmare. It is impossible to keep sane after coming into contact with it.

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
Like how the Goddess's beautiful dreams breathe life into this world, the Goddess's nightmare breathes life into its own creations too sometimes. But those born out of nightmare are nothing but souls. They are known to be in a constant search for bodies.
When they successfully win the body, they will go back to nought - the original form of nightmare.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Do you think I met the darkness?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
But these are just theories shared by the Priestesses. No one has seen or heard about actual cases. But the moment you told me about your dream, it somehow reminded me of those tales.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well... I needed power to protect Lily.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
Can't be.(Priestess of Darkness Rosetta waves her hand as if to shake the nonsensical remark away)
You didn't gain anything you wanted after meeting the darkness, did you? The darkness is known to lure the bodies in this world with such sweet baits, but this is more of a legend than...

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
(Priestess of Darkness Rosetta opens her eyes wide in a surprise)
Are you sure? So you attained the power that you wanted?
{user_nick}, I could feel that you were different from the other warriors, but I never imagined it would be because...

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
But {user_nick}, you're standing in front of me right now and you weren't eaten up by the nightmare.
I've never heard of such cases before. This is interesting.
{user_nick}, if what you told me is true... I'm also very worried at the same time.

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
Since the power you gained is dark and improper, it must be spreading slowly inside you.
And someday, you might really be devoured by it.

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
I don't think I can be of much help to you. I'm sorry.
But there is a way to check whether you've been corrupted by the darkness.

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
Erm... well... (Rosetta seems flustered)
It's something I only skimmed through, and I'm not sure if the book can be trusted as well. Do you want to try trusting this book?

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
"The perpetrators of dark power do not realise that their own actions of using the power would destroy a part of the Goddess's dream and plant a seed of nightmare in its place. If the darkness stays hidden from existence and does not become void, it must be planting its own seed in this world."

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
If there's darkness within you, then there must be traces of nightmare left where you battle with monsters.
We need to see if what the book says is true. Take this with you.
(Priestess of Darkness Rosetta hands over a clear crystal ball)

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
This is called Crackstone. It's something the Priestesses carry around to find cracks in the dimensions.
Oh by the way... I'm screwed if anyone finds out I gave this to you so please keep it a secret.

$Priestess of Darkness Rosetta$
You're not a Priestess so maybe the Crackstone wouldn't be of much help.
But since Encroached Temple Ruins is a place where we always had our rituals, I'm sure the stone will be able to detect the cracks created by the darkness. Defeat the strongest enemy there and come back to me.
* You cannot proceed in a party.

$Velskud$
...Hmph. You managed to find your way like a sneaky rat.
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Velskud$
So you're still going around messing things up, eh?
Your pathetic interference probably screwed something up again.
I can guess it even with my eyes closed.

journal.title: Consultation
journal.contents:
You suddenly remembered a dream you had a long time ago.
Go to Master Warrior Rodrigo and ask for his advice.

Saint Haven - Master Warrior Rodrigo

journal.title: Ominous Dream
journal.contents:
Master Warrior Rodrigo suggested meeting the Priestess of Darkness for matters concerning dreams.
Go to Priestess of Darkness Rosetta and tell her about your dream.

Saint Haven - Priestess of Darkness Rosetta
journal.destination: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Rosetta
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Priestess of Darkness Rosetta.

journal.title: The Nightmare
journal.contents:
You have borrowed the Crackstone used by the Priestesses of Darkness in order to confirm the existence of the darkness.
Go to Encroached Temple Ruins and check the changes in the Crackstone.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

Riverwort Wharf (Meteor Crash Site Entrance) - Encroached Temple Ruins
journal.destination: (Solo) Battle at the Encroached Temple Ruins
journal.todo_msg: Defeat a strong enemy at the Encroached Temple Ruins.

journal.title: The Emerging Cracks
journal.contents:
The Crackstone cracked while you were fighting with a powerful monster.
Talk to Velskud who has appeared at the Encroached Temple Ruins.

* You cannot proceed in a party.

Riverwort Wharf (Meteor Crash Site Entrance) - Encroached Temple Ruins
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Velskud at the Encroached Temple Ruins
journal.todo_msg: The Crackstone broke with a loud crack. Talk to Velskud.
